Text: (My first time back to school in five days...)

(For some reason it feels like everyone is being much
nicer to me than usual...)

(Eh, I'm probably just imagining things. Nothing has
changed.)
(Just the way we extras like it.)

Huh? It's already over? There's still time left for
this class.

The student council is going to come and brief us on
the election. You didn't hear about that?

Election? As if they'd ever pick anyone else besides
some tool from one of the big houses.

But wait, can we even have an election without any
third-years?

The third-years' extra-curricular activities wrap up
this week, so they'll hold the vote next week.

Those lucky bastards. They probably get to hook up
out there in the real world.

Yeah, with grown-up L-A-D-I-E-S. They got a charm the
girls here are missing.
The two of them talk themselves into a frenzy.
Pardon us.

The door to the classroom opens, and two female
students enter.

Thank you for your time today. We're here to explain
the special student council election.

I know one of them since she is none other than
the student council president, Rose Oriana, who
I fought the other day.

I've always wondered how people with good style can
pull off that mysterious chic aura they have, even
when dressed in a plain ol' school uniform.

Skel and I zone out, letting the explanation go in
one ear and out the other. Po, though, is taking
notes on every last word.

Suddenly, Rose and I seem to lock eyes. If she
remembers the extra she clobbered in the first
round of the tourney, I'd be truly impressed.
Hey, she was lookin' right at me.
Yeah.
Oh man, maybe she's scoutin' me for student council.
Yeah.

Aw dude, only problem is I hate annoying stuff like
that.
Yeah.
That pretty much sums up how the time passed.
Let us begin.
As the armored man speaks those wordsâ€”
the artifact activates.
Surges of energy begin to emit in spherical waves...
from the Eye of Avarice.
Hm?
Eventually...
the Eye of Avarice envelops the entire academy.
*sigh*
Freedom seems so far off...
Hm?
It's locked...?
But why? Classes are still in session.
This is...!
What on earth is happening here?
